Posts.Content: I completely agree. I was recently quite upset about a friend's son having his head shaved to raise money. I agree that raising money is great but found all his mother's Facebook posts about how brave he was annoying. An 11 year old boy choosing to have his head shaved is not the same as washing your hair and being covered in it
Posts.Title: Does anyone else dislike the Macmillan Brave the Shave campaign?
